metadata.title: CVE-2018-13346 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The mpatch_apply function in mpatch.c in Mercurial before 4.6.1 incorrectlyproceeds in cases where the fragment start is past the end of the originaldata, aka OVE-20180430-0004.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13346` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1
mercurial-common - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1').
